CFD Penney - Collaborative Annotation Tool

URL: https://codefrydev.in/CFDPenney/

Description: A free web-based collaborative annotation tool for real-time drawing, screen sharing, and image annotation.

Key Features:
- Real-time collaborative drawing
- Screen sharing with annotation
- Image upload and annotation
- Whiteboard drawing
- Multiple drawing tools (pen, arrow, box, text, eraser)
- Color customization
- Stroke width adjustment
- Undo/redo functionality
- Snapshot capture
- Dark/light theme support

Use Cases:
- Team collaboration and brainstorming
- Educational presentations and teaching
- Design feedback and reviews
- Screen annotation and tutorials
- Visual communication

Technology: Web-based application, requires modern browser with JavaScript enabled.
